abstract: Editorial holds that a proposal by New York State Chief Judge Jonathan Lippman to transfer teenagers who commit minor crimes into the family court, instead of prosecuting them as adults, is long overdue.
snippet: A proposal by New York’s chief judge to transfer teenagers who commit minor crimes into the family court, instead of prosecuting them as adults, is long overdue.
lead_paragraph: A proposal by New York’s chief judge to transfer teenagers who commit minor crimes into the family court, instead of prosecuting them as adults, is long overdue.
